verses.verse: Do we <S%G756>begin<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G4921>commend<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3361><s%> <S%G5535>need<s%> we, as <S%G5100>some<s%> others, <S%G1992>letters<s%> of <S%G4956>commendation<s%> to you, <S%G2228>or<s%> letters of <S%G4956>commendation<s%> from you?
You are our <S%G1992>letter<s%> <S%G1449>written<s%> in our <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> <S%G1097>known<s%> and <S%G314>read<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men:<s%>

For as much as you are <S%G5319>manifestly<s%> <S%G5319>declared<s%> to be the <S%G1992>letter<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1247>ministered<s%> by us, <S%G1449>written<s%> not with <S%G3188>ink,<s%> but with the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God;<s%> not in <S%G4109>tables<s%> of <S%G3035>stone,<s%> but in <S%G4560>fleshy<s%> <S%G4109>tables<s%> of the <S%G2588>heart.<s%>
Not that we are <S%G2425>sufficient<s%> of <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> to <S%G3049>think<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> thing as of <S%G1438>ourselves;<s%> but our <S%G2426>sufficiency<s%> is of <S%G2316>God;<s%>

<S%G3739>Who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> has <S%G2427>made<s%> us <S%G2427>able<s%> <S%G1249>ministers<s%> of the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>testament;<s%> not of the <S%G1121>letter,<s%> but of the <S%G4151>spirit:<s%> for the <S%G1121>letter<s%> <S%G615>kills,<s%> but the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> gives <S%G2227>life.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G1248>ministration<s%> of <S%G2288>death,<s%> <S%G1722>written<s%> <S%G1121><s%> and <S%G1795>engraved<s%> in <S%G3037>stones,<s%> was <S%G1722>glorious,<s%> <S%G1391><s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> not <S%G816>steadfastly<s%> <S%G816>behold<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%> for the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of his <S%G4383>countenance;<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> was to be <S%G2673>done<s%> <S%G2673>away:<s%>
<S%G4459>How<s%> shall not the <S%G1248>ministration<s%> of the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> be <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G1722>glorious?<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G1248>ministration<s%> of <S%G2633>condemnation<s%> be <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> does the <S%G1248>ministration<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G4052>exceed<s%> in <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

For <S%G2532>even<s%> that which was <S%G1392>made<s%> <S%G1392>glorious<s%> had <S%G3761>no<s%> <S%G1392>glory<s%> in <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3313>respect,<s%> by <S%G1752>reason<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> that <S%G5235>excels.<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> that which is <S%G2673>done<s%> <S%G2673>away<s%> was <S%G1223>glorious,<s%> <S%G1391><s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> that which <S%G3306>remains<s%> is <S%G1722>glorious.<s%> <S%G1391><s%>
Seeing <S%G3767>then<s%> that we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G1680>hope,<s%> we <S%G5530>use<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3954>plainness<s%> of speech:

And not as <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> which <S%G5087>put<s%> a <S%G2571>veil<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> his <S%G4383>face,<s%> that the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> could not <S%G816>steadfastly<s%> <S%G816>look<s%> to the <S%G5056>end<s%> of that which is <S%G2673>abolished:<s%>

But their <S%G3540>minds<s%> were <S%G4456>blinded:<s%> for <S%G891>until<s%> <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G4594>day<s%> <S%G3306>remains<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2571>veil<s%> not <S%G3361>taken<s%> <S%G348><s%> <S%G343>away<s%> in the <S%G320>reading<s%> of the <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G1242>testament;<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> veil is <S%G2673>done<s%> <S%G2673>away<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
But <S%G2193>even<s%> to <S%G4594>this<s%> <S%G4594>day,<s%> <S%G2259>when<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%> is <S%G314>read,<s%> the <S%G2571>veil<s%> is on their <S%G2588>heart.<s%>
<S%G1161>Nevertheless<s%> <S%G2259>when<s%> it shall <S%G1994>turn<s%> to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> the <S%G2571>veil<s%> shall be <S%G4014>taken<s%> <S%G4014>away.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is that <S%G4151>Spirit:<s%> and <S%G3757>where<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is, <S%G1563>there<s%> is <S%G1657>liberty.<s%>

But we <S%G3956>all,<s%> with <S%G343>open<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G2734>beholding<s%> as in a <S%G2734>glass<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> are <S%G3339>changed<s%> into the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G1504>image<s%> from <S%G1391>glory<s%> to <S%G1391>glory,<s%> even as by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2962>LORD.<s%>
